Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to provide detailed explanation of pseudo-BPMN representation, purpose of each step, meaning of gateways, convergence, looping, differences between standard/custom paths, conditions for approvals/rework.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Should be thorough. No special constraints besides style.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Provide structured analysis. Probably bullet points, flow explanation. Lets craft.
